News.Title: Capillary Technologies Q3 FY26 Results Show Strong Growth
News.Summary: Capillary Technologies reported 16% YoY revenue growth to INR 184 crores in Q3 FY26, with adjusted EBITDA rising 24% to INR 30 crores. Nine-month revenue grew 22% to INR 543 crores.

News.Title: Capillary Technologies schedules investor meetings
News.Summary: Capillary Technologies India Limited announces multiple one-on-one and group meetings with analysts and investors scheduled for February 11-13, 2026 in Mumbai under SEBI regulations.

News.Title: Capillary Technologies Q3FY26 Earnings Call on Feb 6
News.Summary: Capillary Technologies India Limited schedules earnings conference call for February 6, 2026 at 4:30 PM IST to discuss Q3FY26 results ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Capillary Technologies Named Leader in Forrester Wave Loyalty Platforms Report
News.Summary: Capillary Technologies India Limited has been recognized as a Leader in the Forrester Wave - Loyalty Platforms, Q4 2025 report. The company disclosed this achievement to stock exchanges and made the Forrester Wave report available on its website for investors and stakeholders.

News.Title: Capillary Technologies Seeks Shareholder Approval for ESOP Scheme Ratification
News.Summary: Capillary Technologies India Limited has issued a postal ballot notice seeking shareholder approval to ratify its Employee Stock Option Scheme-2021 (ESOP 2021) covering up to 72,91,000 stock options. The e-voting period runs from December 6, 2025 to January 4, 2026, with ratification required under SEBI regulations following the company's listing on BSE and NSE.
